data.title: La Grange, NC
data.text:
Administration

The Town Manager responsible for the implementation of policies adopted by the Town Council, ensures the proper implementation and administration of local, state, and federal laws and regulations, and prepares the annual budget for submission to the Council for its review, amendment, and approval.

Cemetery

Find information about local cemeteries, pricing, and related ordinances.

Community Center

Learn more about community facilities available for rental.

Electric

The Town of La Grange offers reliable, publicly owned electrical service to 1,425 residential and commercial customers.

Employment Opportunities

Browse job openings, download an application, or email your resume.

Finance

The Finance Department is responsible for the management of the Town funds. The department is responsible for daily accounting activities and the collections related to charges for services in the form of our monthly utility bills or other services rendered by the Town.

Law Enforcement

Law Enforcement Services are provided to the citizens of La Grange through a contract between the Town, Lenoir County, and the Lenoir County Sheriff’s Office.

Policies and Schedules

View changes to town schedules and events based on annual holidays.

Parks & Facilities

Check out area parks, facilities, and a list of their amenities.

Planning, Inspections, & Safety

Planning & Code Enforcement is responsible for all Planning Related functions and enforcement of the Town's Code of Ordinances related to development property maintenance and upkeep.

Public Services

The Public Works Department is responsible for the maintenance and upkeep of the Town’s Wastewater Collection system, Storm Drainage System, Water Distribution system, Municipal Streets, Solid Waste collection (other than weekly garbage collection and recyclables which is performed by an outside contractor), Yard Waste Collection, and meter reading services.

Recreation

Though the town does not a formal Recreation Department, programs, services, and facilities are offered for residents and visitors.
